data.title: How to get to Solna via public transport
data.text:
Metro (Tunnelbana)

The metro takes you to Solna centrum in less than ten minutes, with five other stations to choose from today.

To and from Solna by metro

From T-Centralen, it takes about nine minutes on the blue line to get to Solna centrum metro station. The light rail is directly connected to the station, towards Solna station or towards Sickla strand via Alvik, Liljeholmen, and Gullmarsplan.

Other metro stations on the blue line in Solna are Västra skogen (lines 10 and 11), Huvudsta, and Solna strand (line 10), as well as Näckrosen (line 11).

On the red line towards Mörby centrum, there is also a metro station in Bergshamra, about ten minutes from T-Centralen.

Plan your trip to and from Solna at sl.se External link..

Commuter trains (Pendeltåg)

Solna station is located seven minutes from Stockholm city and four minutes from Odenplan by commuter train. The commuter trains connect the entire Stockholm region from Södertälje/Gnesta and Nynäshamn in the south to Bålsta, Märsta, and Uppsala as well as Arlanda in the north.

To and from Solna by commuter train

Today there are two commuter train stations in Solna: Solna station and Ulriksdal. From Stockholm City (adjacent to T-Centralen), it takes seven minutes to Solna station by commuter train. From Odenplan, it takes four minutes.

For visitors to Arenastaden and places like Mall of Scandinavia or Friends Arena, the commuter train to Solna station is usually the best travel option.

Plan your trip to and from Solna at sl.se External link..

Light rail (Tvärbana)

The light rail (Tvärbanan) runs between Sickla Udde to Solna station, via Hammarby Sjöstad, Gullmarsplan, Årsta, Liljeholmen, Alvik, and Sundbyberg, among others.

If you're visiting Arenastaden and places like Mall of Scandinavia or Friends Arena, you can take the light rail to Solna station.

In Solna, in addition to stops at Solna station and Solna center, there is also a stop at Solna Business Park, close to Sundbyberg center where another interchange to commuter trains and the metro is available.

Plan your trip to and from Solna at sl.se External link..
